name: Sawblader
description:
Sawblader

For some reason, you are stuck in an arena, filled with slimes. Too many slimes. But you are quite strong, and you have a handy bat, and a... saw? Well, whatever it takes to survive.

This is a top-down survival game, where you as the player, has to survive hordes of slimes by bashing a saw around the room, with a trusty bat. How long can you survive, and how many slimes can you take down before your inevitable death?

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move.
  • Mouse to aim.
  • LMB to charge and swing.

Made for Trijam #212, with the theme of Too Much. This game tries to fit the theme by featuring an ever-increasing amount of slimes, and probably too much screen shake, because the player has too much power/strength.

Time taken: 5:59:31
